description: Add sub-nav item style for sidebar nav without details/summary
context:
Beads description:
Add a sidebar nav item variant that visually matches the details/summary collapsed state but isn't actually a collapsible section. For nav items that have no children but need to appear at the same visual level as collapsible sections. Should look the same as summary elements in .sidebar-nav but be a simple link/item.
